body.name: Vitade 4K Webcam with AI-Powered Framing,Remote Control Web Camera/10X Digital Zoom 30fps cam USB 3.0 HDR/Dual Noise Cancelling Microphones for PC Mac, Streaming, Video Call, Zoom, Skype, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Al-Powered Auto-Framing】Advanced face detection AI will automatically frame the video according to the number of people in the meeting, keeping the video's focus centralized. The presenter tracking feature intelligently detects and follows the presenter as they move around the room. The AI function can be easily activated via the remote control or touch switch. Perfect for professional meetings.

【4K Web-camera with Sony CMOS Sensor】The 913 Webcam is built with a Sony CMOS Sensor that features up to 3840x2160 UHD resolution at 30 frames per second for unparalleled viewing quality. Equipped with USB 3.0, the transmission speed is 10 times faster than USB 2.0, up to 5 Gbps, enabling high quality image and video transmission.

【Zoomable Webcam with RF 360° And 10X Zoom】Control your video calls with a remote, with10X digital zoom, AI function, One-key mute, Adjust white balance and more. Higher operability, practicality and fun.Control your video calls with a remote so even away from the desk you are still in charge.(Note: Please ensure that you have disabled the auto framing function before using the zoom function.)

【Dual Mics and Canceling Microphones】With AI Noise-Canceling technology to remove ambient sounds that would interfere with communication, the one talking could be heard loud and clear within the distance of up to 5 meters. Perfect for Zoom, Skype, Facetime, Facebook, YouTube, Microsoft Teams, and any other popular video calling software.

【4K Conference Web Camera With HDR Technology 】HDR improves the details of light and dark colors and contrast of the video image, and thus makes the image more realistic.This increases the dynamic range of the video while correcting over and underexposed areas.

【Plug and Play Setup & Widely Compatibility】 The 4k webcam works with USB A or USB C with included Adapter. Plug and play,No additional driver required.You can directly enjoy the webcam in applications such as Skype and Zoom. Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS 10.6, Linux 2.6.24, Chrome OS 29.0.1547 or above, Ubuntu Version 10.04 or above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Webcam for Crystal Clear Video Quality
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Vitade 4K Webcam with AI-Powered Framing, and it has exceeded all my expectations. This webcam is an absolute game-changer when it comes to video quality, convenience, and functionality.Pros:Crystal Clear 4K Video: The 4K video quality delivered by this webcam is nothing short of stunning. Whether I'm using it for video calls, streaming, or recording, the level of detail and sharpness is remarkable. It's like having a professional studio-quality camera right on my computer.AI-Powered Framing: The AI-powered framing feature is a game-changer. It automatically adjusts the framing to keep me centered and in focus, even if I move around. This means no more worrying about staying perfectly still during video calls or adjusting the camera angle constantly.Remote Control: The included remote control is a convenient addition. It allows me to make quick adjustments to zoom, framing, and other settings without having to reach for the computer.In summary, the Vitade 4K Webcam has completely transformed my video communication and streaming experience. Its exceptional video quality, AI-powered framing, and useful features like 10X zoom and HDR make it a top-tier webcam for both personal and professional use. I couldn't be happier with this purchase, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a high-quality webcam. It's worth every penny for the incredible video quality and convenience it brings to the table. This webcam is, without a doubt, deserving of a five-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for streaming
reviews.reviewText: After using my iPad as a camera to stream, I finally decided to get something better and I could not be more happy with that decision. Quality is much better, the remote features are great and set up was very simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I switched from my Anker camera to this one. I love it, it has some bulky issues though.This unit is bigger than my old webcam. See my video. Also the wire in the back sticks out a bit.Apart from the above the camera quality is amazing. It brightens up the images and I love the zoom feature!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the cost
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play, set up doesn't get any easier. Had to replace my last Webcam because my computer stopped recognizing it. This one has several features that are handy like tracking and zoom. So far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: I needed a good camera for an online interview. I opted for this one and it did not disappoint! Tried it also with my family to call relatives to see the children and it accurately identifies a single person or multiples in the frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I never really got to use this product. It kept freezing so I returned. I had high hopes but was extremely disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Features That Make This Stand Out Are Intrusive
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the image quality on the camera was pretty good, but there are a lot of webcams with equally good quality for a much lower price. I bought this because I sit about 2 feet away from my camera and wanted something I could use to zoom in so that people in my meetings don't get to see my entire messy office.The "AI" feature was nearly useless. With the AI turned on, it did not zoom in adequately, much less follow my face.I might have accepted the webcam just for the manual zoom, except that every time I adjusted it using the remote, a zoom-level icon was displayed which, the attendees of my meeting could see, and that remained for several distracting seconds.I would also note that the webcam is pretty large I could have lived with that but some may find it to be too large, particularly if you put it on top of a laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Over all good item. Has a remote so can be used for YouTube videos or general content creation. It will get the job done. The video quality isn't the best. But isn't bad either. Will auto focus if you move closer or further from the camera.
